name: Cap City Fine Diner and Bar

reviews.text: This was such a fun find. We happened to be staying at a hotel in the area, and this was a quick walk down the street. I didn't expect much from the...
Remember when Cap City had great chips with Maytag blue cheese and a wonderful alfredo sauce? Well, those days are long gone. Now it's a cheap, tasteless,...

I made the right call bringing my mother and grandmother here for Mother's Day. It's been nearly 24 hours and they are still raving about it!
